00044 #include <Inventor/nodekits/SoBaseKit.h>
00045 
00046 #include "CmdParameterModified.h"
00047 #include "Trace.h"
00048 
00049 CmdParameterModified::CmdParameterModified( const QStringList& oldValueList, SoBaseKit* coinNode , const QString& coinPart, QUndoCommand* parent )
00050 :QUndoCommand( "ModifyParameter" ,parent ), m_oldValueList( oldValueList ), m_newValueList( 0 ),  m_coinNode( coinNode ), m_nodePart( coinPart )
00051 {
00052         Trace trace( "CmdParameterModified::CmdParameterModified", false);
00053         
00054         SoNode* node = coinNode->getPart( coinPart.toStdString().c_str(), true );
00055         
00056         SoFieldList fieldList; 
00057         int numFields = node->getFields( fieldList );
00058         
00059         m_newValueList = new QStringList;
00060         for(int index = 0; index < numFields; index++)
00061         {
00062                 SbString indexValue;
00063                 fieldList[index]->get( indexValue );
00064                 m_newValueList->append( QString(indexValue.getString() ) );
00065                 
00066         }
00067 
00068 }
00069 
00070 CmdParameterModified::~CmdParameterModified()
00071 {
00072         Trace trace( "CmdParameterModified::~CmdParameterModified", false );
00073 }
00074 
00075 void CmdParameterModified::undo()
00076 {
00077         Trace trace( "CmdParameterModified::undo", false );
00078         SoNode* partNode = m_coinNode->getPart( m_nodePart.toStdString().c_str(), true );
00079         
00080         SoFieldList fieldList; 
00081         int numFields = partNode->getFields(fieldList);
00082         
00083          for( int index = 0; index < numFields; index ++)
00084          {
00085                 if(     m_oldValueList[index] != (*m_newValueList)[index] ){
00086                         
00087                         QString value = m_oldValueList[index];
00088                         
00089                         fieldList[index]->set( value.toStdString().c_str());
00090                         
00091                 }
00092          } 
00093 
00094 }
00095 
00096 void CmdParameterModified::redo()
00097 {
00098         Trace trace( "CmdParameterModified::redo", false );
00099         
00100         SoNode* partNode = m_coinNode->getPart( m_nodePart.toStdString().c_str(), true );
00101         
00102         SoFieldList fieldList; 
00103         int numFields = partNode->getFields(fieldList);
00104         
00105          for( int index = 0; index < numFields; index++ )
00106          {
00107 
00108                 if(     m_oldValueList[index] != (*m_newValueList)[index] ){
00109                         
00110                         QString value = (*m_newValueList)[index];
00111                         
00112                         fieldList[index]->set( value.toStdString().c_str());
00113                 }
00114          }
00115 
00116 }
